title: After how many seconds does YouTube count a view in a 15’’ video? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming you are referring to running a video of 15 seconds as a TrueView ad, and the question is when is the advertiser charged for a view? TrueView counts a view at the 30-second mark, or if the user reaches the end of the video, whichever is shorter. In your case of a 15-second video, the advertiser will be charged only for a view when the user views the complete video.
